::Razorclaw::
The explosions envelope the area around Razorclaw. He leaps 
backwards, dodging machine gun fire, and fires twice at Khonkolor 
and Haluicigen. He notices his charred armour, and wonders how 
much more of this he can take, how soon to pull out. <Where's 
Autofire?> he thinks, his eyes flicking around from the enemy he 
was fighting to the rest of the battle field.


On 19 Apr 2001, at 6:09, airly2000@... wrote:

> Khonkolor continued shooting against Razor Claws
